content.question: The writer wants to add a sentence after sentence 4 that develops the narrative in the second paragraph in a way that makes the audience feel the impact of the loss of the Gros Michel banana. Which of the following sentences best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: This delicious and productive banana was also grown from cuttings until a fungus called fusarium wilt devastated Gros Michel trees.
Fusarium wilt is a fungus that kills banana trees, and Gros Michel trees, which were also grown from cuttings, began to be infected by the wilt.

Also grown from cuttings, Gros Michel bananas were never as popular as Cavendish bananas would become, but they were the most common type of banana until they were killed by a fungus called fusarium wilt.
A devastating fungus called fusarium wilt began to kill Gros Michel banana trees, which, like Cavendish banana trees, were grown from cuttings.

content.answer: This delicious and productive banana was also grown from cuttings until a fungus called fusarium wilt devastated Gros Michel trees.
